original_query: SELECT MIN(ph.Id) FROM postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u, badges as b WHERE u.Id = b.UserId AND u.Id = ph.UserId AND u.Id = v.UserId AND ph.PostHistoryTypeId=1 AND v.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 00:00:00' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.Reputation<=126 AND u.Views<=11 AND u.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-02 16:17:58' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-12 00:16:30' AS TIMESTAMP) AND b.Date<=CAST('2014-09-03 16:13:12' AS TIMESTAMP)
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE postHistory.PostHistoryTypeId = 1

CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.Reputation <= 126 AND users.Views <= 11 AND (CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-02 16:17:58' AND CAST(users.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 00:16:30')
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM badges AS badges WHERE badges.Date <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-03 16:13:12'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4 AS SELECT * FROM E3 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4 WHERE E3.Id=E4.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes WHERE votes.CreationDate <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-12 00:00:00'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E3E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E3E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E3E4.Id=E2.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E3E4E2 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3E4E2 WHERE E1.UserId=E3E4E2.Id)
